name: Tekegysms
tag_list: sms, gsm, mobile, web-sms, digital, direct-marketing, sms-gateway, sms-messaging, business-sms-solutions, smtpemail-gateway, sms-api, pc-to-phone, bulk-sms-gateways, bulk-text-messages, send-text-message-online, bulk-sms-marketing, sending-bulk-text-messa
overview: Tekegy sms is one of the leading providers of bulk sms messaging services and sms gateway connectivity with reliable coverage all over the world. Our Bulk SMS Services allow corporate clients to submit via HTTP or SMPP interface, from any web server, also by using our website interface the users can send single, group or bulk SMS . Tekegy also one of the leading providers of bulk mailing services needed to make your email marketing efforts succed . We offer a profitable direct email marketing strategy for any organization to leverage the additional frequency needed . Now your company can communicate real-time with your customers anytime&anyhere by sending a message directly to the customer’s mobile phones and emails all over the world .

offices.address1: Villa 234 - 5th Compound, First Area, the second District, Street No. 2
